short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accurately recommends your corresponding size across all online stores to minimize clothing returns and shop smarter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize the way you shop online with the Xperience Shopping Chrome Extension: Your Personal AI Fit Assistant. Say goodbye to the hassle of returns and mismatched sizes! We harness the power of computer vision and AI to provide you with ultra-precise size recommendations, tailored just for you.

How It Works - 
1. One-Time Setup: Create a Google account to carry your profile across all devices and stores.
2. Snap & Upload: Just one full-body reference photo is all you need to create your own hyper-realistic 3D avatar.
3. We go to work: We predict your measurements with stunning accuracy. You can tweak them down to the centimeter if needed.
4. Smart Picks: Get the perfect fit every time! We analyze size charts and give you the best choiceâ€”complete with reasons why it's ideal for you!

Why Xperience Shopping?
A. $90 Billion Problem: The fashion industry loses over $90 billion annually due to returns. Our mission? To provide everyone a shopping assistant, getting your size right for you.
B. Dynamic Recommendations: Know exactly where your outfit might be too tight or too loose. Customize your fit preferences effortlessly, and join us for our journey of making virtual avatars practical. 
C. Sustainability Meets Technology: We are committed to minimizing waste and promoting a more sustainable future for fashion. Start playing your part in this revolution!

Get Started Now:
Download the Xperience Shopping Chrome Extension, pin it to your toolbar, and click whenever you're in the mood for some smart, eco-friendly online shopping.
